trans-unit.target: TEXT_OPENINGULDAH_WYMOND_000_10<tab>Don't be like that, friend! I promise I'll make it worth your while!
TEXT_OPENINGULDAH_TUTUMOKO_000_10<tab>Ul'dah not to your liking, newcomer? Why not partake of the Quicksand's hospitality before you decide to leave us?
TEXT_OPENINGULDAH_BUBUKKULI_000_05<tab>Halt! You've not joined the guild yet, have you? I thought not. Head to the Quicksand, adventurer─registration is mandatory.
TEXT_OPENINGULDAH_YUYUTAZI_000_10<tab>Hey, weren't you on the carriage that just arrived? All new adventurers are required to register at the guild before wandering off into the city.
TEXT_OPENINGULDAH_WIL_SYSTEM_000_20<tab>Welcome to Ul'dah, the shining beacon of prosperity rising from the deserts of Thanalan.
TEXT_OPENINGULDAH_WIL_SYSTEM_000_21<tab>Follow the instructions to move your character and adjust the position of the camera.
TEXT_OPENINGULDAH_WIL_SYSTEM_000_22<tab>When you are ready to proceed, speak to Wymond.
TEXT_OPENINGULDAH_FST_SYSTEM_000_23<tab>Please select the control scheme you wish to use.
